example.name: autogen1
example.text: an 18 % appreciation of the Canadian dollar against its U.S. counterpart in the past three years that has made Canadian goods more costly in the U.S.

roleset.name: esteem, value, have a fondness for

example.name: autogen1
example.text: Broadcasters have a healthy appreciation of the role entertainment values play in captivating an audience .
example.arg: of the role entertainment values play in captivating an audience

example.name: autogen2
example.text: He had developed a hatred for the hacker and a grudging appreciation of the federal `` spooks '' who make national security their business .
example.arg: of the federal `` spooks '' who make national security their business
